Package com.spleefleague.core.game.battle

Class BattlePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spleefleague.core.game.battle.BattlePlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TeamBattlePlayer 
    public abstract class BattlePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    BattlePlayer stores a DBPlayer and fallen state of a player, managed in Battle's battlers
